content: {"name": "Bentley Community Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "pantry  help low income families take $85 a month and give $1200 worth of vouchers to shop high-quality food every month so they give four vouchers each week worth $300 to every family", "email": "", "url": "https://bentleycommunityservices.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3562 New Jersey 27", "address_2": null, "city": "Kendall Park", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08824", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.4211298, "longitude": -74.5765724}, "phones": [{"number": "(908) 227-0684", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Donations required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Offers job training/assistance"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required by phone"}]}
